title: Textile, 1930s
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: hand screen printed on plain weave
inscribed: Silk screened in lower right corner: Designed by (blank) Instructor George Cohen N.Y.C. Art Project (screen printed in lower right corner)
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Ella Ostrowsky
description: One quarter offset brick repeat of island scene with palm trees and dome-roofed huts. Printed in red, yellow, and blue (yellow over red for orange, blue over yellow for green, red over blue and yellow for brown) on white ground.
